坉字的基本解释

坉
tún
用草袋装土筑墙或堵水。
田垄。
寨子。

坉
dùn
古同“沌”。
塞。

坉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tún］
［《廣韻》徒渾切，平魂，定。］
(1)田垄。
(2)以草裹土筑城及填水。
[②]［dùn］
［《廣韻》徒損切，上混，定。］
同“沌1”。

坉字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　坉； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页225第06
【廣韻】【集韻】?徒渾切，音屯。【玉篇】水不通不可別流。一曰草土塡水曰坉。一曰田隴。今西北莊家曰坉子。　又【廣韻】徒損切，音沌。亦塡塞也。

坉字的源字形

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tún］
["Guangyun" is full of excitement, calm soul, set. ]
(1) Tianlong.
(2) Use grass to wrap the soil to build a city and fill in water.
[②]［dùn］
["Guangyun" is only cut, mixed, fixed. ]
Same as "Chaos 1".

[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　坉; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 225 06
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Tu Hun cut, Yin Tun. [Jade articles] Water is impassable and cannot stop flowing. One said Caotuyuan water said Tu. One said Tian Long. Today's Northwest dealer is called Yuzi.　[Guang Yun] It’s just a loss and chaos. It's also stuffy.
